messages.subject: Okita vid - nhk fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Had a song that I couldn t get out of my head so... LOL I made a vid. It s a little weird, guess got carried away with using special effects. LOL... Oh well...
messages.messageBody:
Had a song that I couldn't get out of my head so... LOL I made a
vid. It's a little weird, guess got carried away with using special
effects. LOL... Oh well... Here's one for the community...

http://hajime.gotdns.com/misc.htm

^_^ See you guys again soon... And Sec those NHK fanarts were a
great find...
